thread.section_title: KeepCalling.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of KeepCalling.com | keepcalling.com | 3 of 81
thread.title: Steffen Schubert

author: Steffen Schubert
title: Steffen Schubert
text: Best of all, both SMS and calls are way cheaper than our local cell providers in Ireland. All of these charge 30-35 cents per minute for calls to Irish cells, and about 14 cents for each SMS. KeepCalling charges less than 3 cents (one tenth!) for calls per minute and 8 cents per text (half price). And since KC works via my cell's data network, I can make great quality calls at a fraction of the price in Ireland.
